RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 15 Allowed 3 lb s. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BARBERS POINT set pace, driving. WHISKEY TALKING stalked three wide, second best. ULTRA DIVA chased, needed more. GOT ANY no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Tra ck.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMASH set pace, drew off, driving. KNOWN rallied,second best. VALEROSO stalked winner, weakened late. MAGIC MOUNTAIN rank in first turn, no threat. HOLY TRUTH no factor. WHATA GUY early speed, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Mountain
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank in first turn, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTY MIDNIGHT rushed to lead, drew off, won easily. MORE TO FOLLOW chased, second best. ADRIANA ES BONITA in tight early, mild rally. SENA THE DUCHESS tightened up rivals early, no menace. HELLO PERFECT steadied early. NO CAUSE TO DOUBT brief speed, tired. TEXAS DANA clipped heels, lost rider,walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Sena the Duchess
ENTRY.OWNER: MM Racing LLC and Laureano Anderson

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEYOND GONE stalked early, took command on turn, won driving. PROFESSIONAL rallied three wide, just missed. BIG FALCON ROCKET moved up on turn, finished gamely. LOST IN MANHATTAN showed late interest. CHATTERMAN up close, weakened. CAVALLOTTO steadied early, no menace. FLASH ME BACK disputed pace, gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Falcon Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up on turn, finished gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In E ligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANELITA stalked four wide, assumed command at the quarter pole, won driving. BELLA BASORA rallied. SUSIKIN mild rally. LIGHT HEARTED saved ground, weakened late. SUGAR BRITCHES was off a step slow, no threat. TREASURED NIKKY dueled, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Britches
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a step slow, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIKIO rallied strongly on turn, won driving. ROLL DEM BONES dueled from inside, held gamely. LONE LEADER saved ground, held show. VENEZUELANDREAMERS up close, weakened. MIGHTY FROSTED showed little. INGERSOLL dueled, tired. CAPONE'S LOFT outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Rikio
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline, Robert and Lucas, Robert A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied strongly around turn, won driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In El igibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HUMMIN' THE FUNK settled midpack, urged on the turn, held driving. NATIVE VALLEY rallied strongly while five wide. WHATRUWAITINGFOR dueled, led, weakened. CROSSTOWN GIRL steadied into first turn, bid, flattened out late. EGG NOG tired. HERO'S DAUGHTER contested pace, gave way. LADY MECHANIC tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Crosstown Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied into first turn, flattened out late

ENTRY.NAME: Hummin' the Funk
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled midpack, urged on turn, held driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 15 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHOPPED midpack, rallied, driving. MIDNIGHT ALIBI stalked leader, bid, gamely. KHOPILOT saved ground, gained show. BON DEUX set pace, tired. CLEVELAND POWER showed little. BLOWN SAVE no factor. LOOKA LOOKA brief speed, tired. LUVTHEONEURWITH outrun.
